summary: Completed testing of Mood-Based Dietary Suggestions feature - Backend 100% pass (16/16 tests), Frontend UI fully functional with all components working correctly

issues: AI suggestions take 10-20 seconds to load - loading spinner shown during this time. Consider adding skeleton loading or progress indicator for better UX

seed_data_creation: Test user dietary preferences updated during testing: diet_type=vegan, allergies=[Gluten, Soy], meal_prep_time=quick
context_for_next_testing_agent: Mood-Based Dietary Suggestions feature fully tested. All 3 suggestion types (quick_snack, recipe, meal_plan) working. Dietary preferences form saves correctly. Dashboard shows compact Nutrition Suggestion component with type selector buttons. Full Nutrition page accessible via sidebar. AI integration uses GPT-5.2 and takes 10-20 seconds to generate suggestions.

GET /api/users/me/dietary-preferences.details: Returns dietary_preferences object and is_configured boolean

PUT /api/users/me/dietary-preferences.details: Updates diet_type, allergies, intolerances, cultural_preferences, avoid_foods, preferred_cuisines, meal_prep_time, budget_preference

POST /api/dietary/suggestions (quick_sna.details: Returns AI-generated snack suggestion with title, description, reasoning, ingredients, mood_benefits, nutritional_highlights

POST /api/dietary/suggestions (recipe).details: Returns full recipe with preparation_steps, prep_time, and alternatives

POST /api/dietary/suggestions (meal_plan.details: Returns structured daily meal plan with multiple meals

Nutrition page loads.details: Page header 'Mood-Based Nutrition' visible, dietary preferences banner/edit button shown

Dashboard Nutrition Suggestion component.details: Compact component shows suggestion title, description, mood benefits, and type selector buttons (Snack/Recipe/Meal Plan)

Dietary preferences form.details: Form includes Diet Type, Allergies, Intolerances, Foods to Avoid, Preferred Cuisines, Prep Time, Budget - all save correctly

Suggestion type buttons.details: All three buttons (Snack, Recipe, Meal Plan) visible and clickable, trigger new AI suggestions
